verses.name: Proverbs 26:7
verses.text: The legs of the lame are not equal: so is a parable in the mouth of fools.

verses.name: Proverbs 26:8
verses.text: As he that bindeth a stone in a sling, so is he that giveth honour to a fool.

verses.name: Proverbs 26:9
verses.text: As a thorn goeth up into the hand of a drunkard, so is a parable in the mouth of fools.

verses.name: Proverbs 26:10
verses.text: The great God that formed all things both rewardeth the fool, and rewardeth transgressors.

verses.name: Proverbs 26:11
verses.text: As a dog returneth to his vomit, so a fool returneth to his folly.
